page.title: 19CUSTOMS - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: {Twinning links with FRANCE Over the past ten years North Tawton has developed strong links with the French town of{Blangy-le-Chateau}in Normandy. Groups of people from each community have visited each others' homes and community events have been arranged for their entertainment. In particular children from{North {Tawton School}have stayed in Blangy-le-Chateau for periods of up to five days and been entertained by their French counterparts.Children from the French town have spent similar periods in North Tawton.Visits are arranged on a bi-annual basis. Greetings are exchanged at Christmas and children are encouraged to maintain friendships which have developed.
